title: Rocket Calculator
description: AI powered cat feeding robot, powered by Arduino.

blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: After creating my model rocket, I was interested in the probable apogee that I had achieved. I ended up doing quite a bit of math to solve this, however it only used a few inputs, such as the mass, thrust, and burn time. To solve for this, I created this for other people to use to simulate the results of a flight. Check it out here.
